overview: Vegging out in front of the TV, boredom, love and aggression: A sunday afternoon and nothing to do for Micha and Steven, except maybe setting a home for asylum-seekers on fire. Or should they just go on watching TV? With the old lady from the third floor, Oskar with his filthy videotapes, the homeless guitar player and Micha and Steven amongst them, boredom, sadness and the most bizarre weekend of their life, is just about to come. Just Norman doesn't have any time, again... .
title: Weekend for Racists
